Author: Bethax
Title: [ANN][STO]Royal Sting – FinTech B2B2C Platform based on Blockchain Technology🔺
Body: We are divulging all the technical secrets today⛓  ▫️Speaking about snapshot, it should be mentioned that it occurs every 10 minutes and records the balances of the accounts at the moment. This means that only your final balance will get into the picture.  ▫️Each your transaction is considered to be fully confirmed after the delegates record, however you can consider that it confirmed instantly. In order to transfer funds, sender should find several validators who will freeze money from their personal accounts in advance. Whenever, it happens a fraud, the Protocol will compensate the losses to the victim, taking the required amount from the validators.  ▫️If you want to become a validator, just freeze the wallet to a certain snapshot and run the node with a special key. Just remember that freezing your coins will require a standard commission for any transaction, so you should have some capital in order to become popular among validators.  ▫️Hope today we became a lil bit more understandable for you. If you have any questions regarding our technology, feel free to ask👉🏼 https://t.me/royal_sting

Author: Bethax
Title: [ANN][STO]Royal Sting – FinTech B2B2C Platform based on Blockchain Technology🔺
Body: WORLD WITHOUT BORDERS              A cross-border digital transfer system that offers the innovative technology of instant transfers and globally solves the existing  problem with payments for immigrants around the world. The system combines multi-faceted security based on the decentralized storage system in the Blockchain network, instantaneous speed of funds transfer. The recipient and the sender see the result in real time, the ability to carry out transactions 24/7 - 365 days a year.               B2B/B2C. PLATFORM BASED ON P2P TECHNOLOGY              Ease and security in mutual settlements using digital currency Sting, as a part of the Royal Sting ecosystem, designed to digitize international and local trade. RSU is the unified unit to buy or sell goods and services. Decentralized Escrow - is to ensure the security of user transactions based on data encryption in the Blockchain network: convenient, fast, automated, without the involvement of third parties. Transactions are carried out in an automatic mode, in a simple and clear interface, where each party in a convenient way prescribes the terms of the transaction, attaches a document that can be immediately signed in the transaction room.               MOBILE APP ROYAL STING              - Choose a provision for RSU on your choice!            - Create multiple accounts!            - Withdraw to any bank card or wallet in the currency that you need!               ISSUANCE AND DISTRIBUTION RSF              Our clients-both corporate and private will receive all the necessary services from a single platform. The blockchain technology opens new possibilities of joining 3 major positions, speed, versatile safety, savings. The product is integrated for the maintenance of stream Russia–Kyrgyzstan and the development of the market of the Eurasian economic community (EurAsEC). Marketing allows to pay attention to the new development.               PUBLIC DOCUMENTS                 ✔️Business plan              ✔️Investment proposal              ✔️One Pager              ✔️Presentation              ✔️RSF registration procedure              ✔️MAP of Ecosystem              ✔️Investment plan of development

Author: Bethax
Title: [ANN][STO]Royal Sting – FinTech B2B2C Platform based on Blockchain Technology🔺
Body: RSU - a single digital unit, one to one quoted to the any fiat currency of your choice with the ability to convert into the desired currency available at the point of sell-out of Sting for cash or purchases of goods and services.  Thus, RSU – is the stablecoin a digital currency, which is 100% secured by a traditional valuable asset.  You also have been interested why did we chose to hold STO, but not ICO?⤵️⤵️⤵️  ✔️RSF is a digital equity security, which is used to identify participants and provides an opportunity to receive income from the project activities. ✔️The RSF holder becomes a classic shareholder, receiving a share in the company and income from dividends. RSF holders keep their digital stocks system wallet. ✔️Holder of RSF has the right to sell its RSF on the stock / digital exchange at any time. ✔️RSF unlike RSU is not tied to the ruble or other currency, and is a share quoted on the exchange. With earned profits from the project World without Borders. ✔️RSF owners receive dividends in the form of RSU, quarterly transferred to a personal wallet.  ‼️Now we have a special investment proposal for you➡️ https://royalsting.com/public/js/pdf.js/web/viewer.html?file=words/eng/Invest%20Proposal.pdf

Author: Bethax
Title: [ANN][STO]Royal Sting – FinTech B2B2C Platform based on Blockchain Technology🔺
Body: Royal Sting platform is a serious and secure system, which operates in a strict algorithm✅⬇️  ✔️First of all the client should pass a KYC procedure through a bank or in Sting wallet. After this, your wallet is ready for internal convention of Fiat/Sting.  ✔️Second step is deposing a minimum sum of 5000 rubles via ATM/terminals on your personal account. Within your account, there is a possibility of direct transfer right from your wallet in one click.  ✔️After this, Royal Sting platform provides users with an opportunity to transfer assets to another wallets.  ✔️If you don’t have a bank card, you should pass the KYC procedure to open an account to which Sting wallet was created.  ✔️Then, register your debit card in Sting Wallet and use all the opportunities of ATM World systems.  Ready to join? Dive in👉🏼 https://royalsting.com
